name: A-List Girl: Nail Salon 2
description:
The A-List Girl game series is back with this super fun nail salon free game for girls and children of all ages!

* Pass levels and upgrade to better and luxurious nail salons! Make your clients happy! Wash hands, clean nails and wounds; file, polish nails, choose different nail patterns and decorate them!

* Lot's of mini-games to stimulate memory, coordination, time managing, learning games to count money and many more!

* Play freely with your imagination and do amazing nail designs in free mode :) Take a photo and share with your friends. Let's see who have better nails!


For parents:
This free game is perfect for your child, stimulates memory, helps with time managing and how to count money.

If you like this free game please share it on social media. Please rate and comment if you like the game! Thank you for playing!
